name: rental-app-fullstack
description: AplicaciÃ³n completa de alojamientos universitarios UCH-CEU

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run migrate && npm run generate
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run init:production && npm run build:production && npm start

author: UCH-CEU
